title: Hickok (2017, Western Film) Luke Hemsworth, Kris Kristofferson, Bruce Dern

sources.title: Hickok (2017, Western Film) Luke Hemsworth, Kris Kristofferson, Bruce Dern
sources.description:
Where Law Meets Legend in the Wildest Town of the West.
Legendary lawman and gunslinger, Wild Bill Hickok, is tasked with taming the wildest cow-town in the west. While delivering his own brand of frontier justice, the infamous gunfighter's reputation as the fastest draw in the west is put to the test.

Original title: Hickok (2017)
This film is subtitled in many languages.

Director: Timothy Woodward Jr.
Writer: Michael Lanahan
Stars: Luke Hemsworth, Kris Kristofferson, Trace Adkins, Bruce Dern
Genres: Drama, Western
Budget: $8,000,000 (estimated)


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
03:53 Bill is arrested and confronts Wild Bill Hickok in a tense poker game.
12:04 A gunslinger is offered the role of marshal in a lawless town.
19:41 New marshal Bill Hickok faces bribery, reconnects with an old flame, and navigates town politics.
28:59 Bill deals with a jailer, prisoner, hat shop visit, and a gunshot wound.
39:15 The marshal enforces a no-guns rule, facing pushback and a notorious gunslinger.
44:34 Wild Bill faces local threats as a bounty is placed on him in Abilene.
55:19 A lawman faces off with a gunslinger, leading to an unexpected offer and possible partnership.
1:02:43 A doctor delivers a life-changing diagnosis to Bill, sparking confrontations and revelations.
1:11:02 Wild Bill confronts his past, weighing escape against facing his fears.
